Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the time taken to initiate a response to an emergency.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Emergencies / Number of Emergencies

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of completed emergency preparedness drills.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Emergency Preparedness Drills / Total Number of Planned Drills) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of the emergency response plan.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Emergency Responses / Total Number of Emergency Drills or Incidents) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of employees participating in emergency drills.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Participating in Emergency Drills / Total Number of Employees) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the reliability of the emergency communication system.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Communications / Total Number of Communication Attempts) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to complete emergency evacuations.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Time to Complete Emergency Evacuation / Number of Evacuation Drills

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of coordination with emergency responders.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Rating of Coordination with Emergency Responders

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of lessons identified from emergency simulations.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Number of Lessons Learned from Simulations / Total Number of Simulations
